structured.description: A man with a bald head and a full, reddish-brown beard is presented from the chest up, wearing professional business attire. He is smiling warmly at the viewer against a dark blue background featuring an intricate glowing network pattern, suggesting a tech-oriented or connected theme. The overall presentation conveys a sense of professionalism combined with an approachable and friendly demeanor.
structured.facial_features: The avatar has a bald head, prominent eyebrows, and a full, well-groomed reddish-brown beard. His eyes are open and looking directly forward.
structured.expression: The avatar exhibits a friendly and open smile, with his teeth clearly visible.
structured.attire: The avatar is dressed in a black suit jacket over a crisp white collared shirt. He wears a bright blue tie with subtle horizontal stripes.
structured.palette: The dominant colors are dark blue for the background, black for the suit, white for the shirt, and reddish-brown for the beard, accented by the bright blue tie and glowing network elements.
structured.background: The background is a deep blue color, featuring a luminous, interconnected network pattern composed of light blue lines and glowing circular nodes.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
